excerpt.rendered:
Vial | 5 ml | gm
Active ingredients :
• Vitamin C 25 mg/ml

Benefits :
• Is a very effective anti-oxidant that neutralizes free radicals – the unstable molecules that age the skin as a result of pollution, smoking and exposure to the sun-. It inhibits melanin, stimulates growth of the hydro-lipid film and enhances collagen synthesis, an important skin protein that strengthens the structural support and elasticity of the skin.
• Gives radiant and shining skin.
• Anti-aging
• Brightness skin and provides long lasting moisturizing .

Vitamin C for :
• Treat and prevent photo-ageing, uneven complexions and for helping the skin to fight wrinkles.
• Revitalizes skin tone and protects against free radicals

Areas of treatment :
• Face
• Body

How to use ?
By injection or derma-pen
Without dilution
